title: BRIEF-Health Canada Advises Canadians Using Vaping Products To Monitor Themselves For Pulmonary Illness Symptoms
text:
BRIEF-Health Canada Advises Canadians Using Vaping Products To Monitor Themselves For Pulmonary Illness Symptoms

Stock Markets 2 minutes ago (Sep 04, 2019 20:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Health Canada Advises Canadians Using Vaping Products To Monitor Themselves For Pulmonary Illness Symptoms Sept 4 (Reuters) - Health Canada: * HEALTH CANADA SAYS ADVISING CANADIANS WHO USE VAPING PRODUCTS TO MONITOR THEMSELVES FOR SYMPTOMS OF PULMONARY ILLNESS * HEALTH CANADA-HEALTH CANADA & PUBLIC HEALTH AGENCY OF CANADA IN CLOSE CONTACT WITH FDA,CDC TO BETTER UNDERSTAND INVESTIGATION INTO CAUSE OF ILLNESSES

BRIEF-Health Canada Advises Canadians Using Vaping Products To Monitor Themselves For Pulmonary Illness Symptoms
